title: Dr Lal PathLabs - Blood Test
description:
Dr Lal PathLabs – Enabling Healthier Lives

India’s leading diagnostic player with 50+ quality checks and 5000+ test menu. We have established a vast network of 15000+ touch points, including patient service centers and hospitals. This makes Dr Lal PathLabs the biggest diagnostic laboratories network in India.

With 70+ years of experience, we bring medical expertise and proficiency in the field of diagnostics. Our team of highly skilled professionals, including experienced doctors and technicians, ensures the highest standard of quality and precision in every test we conduct.  

About Dr Lal PathLabs Mobile App

We bring to you the ease of diagnostic services through our app. You can book any blood or urine test, or full body checkups suggested by doctors at your convenience through Dr Lal PathLabs app.  

Some Common Blood Tests Include: 

1. Diabetes test 
2. Thyroid test
3. CBC
4. Vitamin D
5. Allergy test 

Some Common Urine Tests Include:

1. Creatinine Test
2. Uric Acid Test
3. Urea Test
4. C-Peptide Test
5. Pregnancy Test

Dr Lal PathLabs also provide Advance Tests, such as:

1. Dual Marker Test
2. PAPPA Test
3. Quadruple Marker Test
4. Non-invasive Prenatal Testing (NIPT) 
5. Karyotyping
6. Antiphospholipid Antibody (APLA) Panel
7. Bad Obstetric History (BOH) Panel

With home collection and 15000+ touchpoints, Dr Lal PathLabs is revolutionizing the healthcare landscape of India by providing accessible, convenient, and reliable diagnostic to every Indian right at the doorstep.

Timely Reports 

Dr Lal PathLabs is one of the oldest players who focuses on bringing quality diagnosis services by providing accurate and timely test results to our valued customers. Our well-defined processes, trained staff and NABL and CAP accreditation ensure that we are able to reduce the error margin, which means that we are able to give accurate reports on time. 

Dr Lal PathLabs App Features

1. Create a profile of you and your family for easy test bookings. 
2. Easy navigation to complete information about Routine Medical Tests.
3. Book a blood test or full body health checkup at your convenience, either from the comfort of your home or at a laboratory.
4. Locate a nearby Patient Service Centre for your convenience.
5. Track your phlebotomists in real-time.
6. Access and download your test reports online.
7. Access your current as well as past reports with DLPL at one place.
8. Access reports of your family members with a simple swipe.
9. Earn Swasth Points every time you book a test. 

Regular Blood Tests at Dr Lal PathLabs Pathology Test App for precise Healthcare Solutions:

1. Diabetes Test
2. Fasting Blood Sugar Test
3. Thyroid Function Test
4. Cholesterol Test
5. Fasting Glucose Test
6. HbA1c Test
7. Vitamin D Test
8. CBC Test
9. Vitamin B12 Test
10. Liver Function Test
11. Kidney Function Test
12. Lipid Profile Test
13. ASCVD Risk Score
14. Hemoglobin Test
15. Double Marker Test
16. Creatinine Test
17. Urine Culture Test
18. Allergy Test
19. Pregnancy Test
20. Thyroid Test
21. Malaria Test
22. Typhoid Test
23. D Dimer Test
24. Full Body Test

Full Body Health Packages at Dr Lal PathLabs App for precise Healthcare Solutions:

1. Swasthfit Super
2. Swasthfit Complete
3. Swasthfit Check Basic
4. Swasthfit Diabetes Check Extended
5. Swasthfit Diabetes Check Complete
6. Swasthfit Diabetes & Heart Check Basic
7. Swasthfit Diabetes & Heart Check Complete
8. Swasthfit Active Man
9. Swasthfit Senior Man
10. Swasthfit Active Woman
11. Swasthfit Senior Woman

Visit for more info: https://www.lalpathlabs.com

To stay up to date on the latest health insights and to know about tests and conditions visit our Blog at https://www.lalpathlabs.com/blog

To stay tuned about our exciting offers & latest happenings follow us on:

1. Facebook - https://www.facebook.com/lalpathlabs
2. Twitter - https://twitter.com/lalpathlabs
3. Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/lalpathlabs_
4. LinkedIn: https://www.linkedin.com/company/dr-lal-pathlabs
